review: Everything I expected and more. Very pleased..
author: Amazon Customer

review: Now I have a reason to cut cable tv. Great job Amazon.
author: William E Ottens

review: Great little device. Use it for built-in widgets, Kodi, stream YT videos from your phone etc.
author: Jack Sparrow

review: Outstanding - I am so happy with the Amazon Fire TV Stick.  I was so bored with regular cable and the lack of shows but this allows me to get all the programing from netflix., etc.  It was easy to install and set up too.
author: Suzanne Denn

review: Compared to Roku v2,  Fire Stick feels like an upgrade given the user being a Prime member.
author: tiitanup

review: Love it!  Easy to set up.
author: msus

review: Works Great.  I love that you can rewind, fast forward, and pause!
author: Monica williams

review: There is barely any content available outside the US. The main reason I got this was for traveling.
author: Bijoy Kothari

review: Very easy to use..compact....love it...actually bought one for a friend...definitely worth the money
author: Christine Sauro
